text: "Ways to Be Wicked", is a song performed by Dove Cameron, Sofia Carson, Cameron Boyce and Booboo Stewart, was premiered on Radio Disney and then was officially released as Descendants 2 soundtrack's first single on April 14, 2017 by Walt Disney Records. ==Live performances== On May 1, 2017 Dove Cameron, Cameron Boyce, Booboo Stewart and Sofia Carson, introduced the theme in the show Dancing with the Stars along with the song "Rotten to the Core" belonging to the first soundtrack. On July 17, the cast performed a mashup of "Ways to Be Wicked" and "What's My Name", both original songs from the movie musical on Good Morning America. ==Music video== The music video of "Ways to Be Wicked" was premiered on April 29, 2017 in the 2017 Radio Disney Music Awards in Microsoft Theater, Los Angeles. The video was directed by Kenny Ortega and released on April 30, 2017 ==Track listing== * Digital download # "Ways to Be Wicked" — 3:38 ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable" ! scope="col" | Chart (2017) ! scope="col" | Peak position |- |- |} ==Certification== ==Release history== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- !scope="col"|Country !scope="col"|Date !scope="col"|Format !scope="col"|Label |- !scope="row"|United States | April 14, 2017 | Digital download | Walt Disney |- |} ==References== Category:2017 singles Category:2017 songs Category:Walt Disney Records singles Category:Dove Cameron songs Category:Songs written by Sam Hollander Category:Songs from Descendants (franchise)
title: Ways to Be Wicked (Descendants song)
